xxl.core.io.fat
Class FATFilesystemOperations

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.io.fat.FATFilesystemOperations
All Implemented Interfaces:
FilesystemOperations
public class FATFilesystemOperations
extends java.lang.Object
implements FilesystemOperations

This class implements the file system operations for the FAT.

Field Summary

          FATDevice used for the content of the files.
